thread.title: Sarah Humphrey
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Sarah Humphrey

author: Sarah Humphrey
title: Sarah Humphrey
text: I recently used Servicing Stop for my car service - booking online was quick and simple and I received email confirmations at each step. They rang to inform me which garage would be collecting my car and also rang to inform me of what work needed doing to the car. The guy on the phone was incredibly helpful and understood I needed to keep costs down so informed me I what work needed doing immediately and what could wait a week or so. Payment online was easy and went through quickly. My car was serviced and returned by 3pm.
